thread.section_title: Thrift Books Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Thrift Books | www.thriftbooks.com | 20 of 3553
thread.title: Charlotte

author: Charlotte
title: Charlotte
text:
ThriftBooks is the only place I would purchase books after my first order with them. They literally have any books I look for with so many editions I can choose from.Their price is unbeatable and the free shipping over 10 dollars is a plus.
Physical books have a special attraction to me in this world which is being eaten up by a virtue world. I thank ThriftBooks for what they are doing for 'traditional' readers like myself.
